name: Honey Buns
steps: Pour Milk into a pot
Bring to a near boil, but take off heat once you see steam
Transfer Milk to a mixing bowl and wait until it cools to ~90/100F
Mix Milk, honey, and yeast together until consistent
Wait 5 minutes for yeast to proof
Mix in Butter (3 Tbsps, melted), Egg, and 2 Cups of Flour
Mix until smooth, then gradually add Salt + rest of Flour (2 Cups)
Knead for 10 minutes
Spray an opaque bowl with cooking spray and drop dough inside
Cover with a tea towel and leave out to rise for an hour
Punch down the dough
Roll out on a floured surface until about 1/2" thick
Fold in half and gently seal so there's no air between layers
Cut into 24 squares of even size
Place squares on a lightly greased pan
Cover with a tea towel and leave to rise for 40 minutes
Preheat oven to 350F
Remove tea towel and place pan in the oven
Let bake until tops are lightly golden brown (~12 minutes)
Brush tops with Butter (1 Tbsp, melted) and serve w/ Honey Butter
